    Gameboy Emulation Project

    I have been building a Gameboy emulator in my spare time. Of course, I have ran into numerous difficulties and complications, leading to a wortwhile learning experience in computer architecture and systems programming.

    Creating Compilers

    Recently I have bought various infamous textbooks on compilers (ie. the Dragon book) as I explore the unending rabbithole of compiler theory.
